info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 19 at 3:29PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTHERN LITCHFIELD AND NORTHERN LITCHFIELD COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 329 PM EST, a snow squall was over Winsted, or near Torrington moving east at 35 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... New Hartford and New Hartford Center around 340 PM EST. Canton around 350 PM EST. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
